title: Real time Stream Processing and Analytics Pipeline
description: The Smart City Real-Time Streaming & Analytics Pipeline ingests real-time smart city IoT data (vehicle telemetry, GPS, weather, traffic, emergency events) through Apache Kafka, processes and enriches it using Spark Structured Streaming, stores both raw and enriched data in Amazon S3, catalogs the schema using AWS Glue Crawlers and the Data Catalog, enables ad-hoc SQL querying via Amazon Athena, and loads analytics-ready datasets into Amazon Redshift for business intelligence and reporting.

title: Retail Analytics Pipeline using S3, Snowflake and Power-BI
description: This project presents an end-to-end retail analytics pipeline that simulates a Point of Sale (POS) data flow. It leverages Amazon S3 for data storage, Snowflake for warehousing and semantic modeling, and Power BI for real-time dashboarding. The goal is to deliver business insights from structured sales and customer data.  I modeled the schema in Snowflake using a star schema, and built a semantic layer using SQL views and Power BI relationships to define KPIs, hierarchies, and drill-down paths for analysis.
description2: Designed and published 3 dynamic Power BI dashboards, enabling data-driven decisions across 50+ store locations. Authored 4 professional-grade reports and delivered schema documentation, ensuring technical clarity, stakeholder alignment, and auditability for BI/analytics teams.

title: House Price Prediction using Ensemble learning
description: This project predicts housing prices using classical and ensemble machine learning algorithms across two real estate datasets — California and King County. It involves comprehensive data preprocessing, exploratory analysis, and visualization to extract meaningful patterns. Key steps include handling missing data, outlier removal, feature engineering, and transformation. Multiple regression models were trained and evaluated, with CatBoost achieving over 90% accuracy, making the system reliable for real estate insights and price forecasting.

title: Crop Recommendation and Yeild Prediction
description: The Crop Recommendation and Yield Prediction System is a machine learning project that aids precision agriculture by recommending suitable crops based on soil and weather conditions and predicting crop yields using historical data. The Naive Bayes model achieved 97.28% accuracy for crop recommendation, while Random Forest reached a 97.3% R² score for yield prediction. Built with Python and Scikit-learn, the project demonstrates the impact of ML in enhancing agricultural decision-making.
